00041 class Template extends AbstractClass
00042 {

00046         const TAG_OPEN = '[';
00047         
00049         const TAG_CLOSE = ']';
00050

00054 //--------------------------------------------------------- Public Methods
00055 
00063     public static function BuildTag ( $tagName )
00064     {
00065         return self::TAG_OPEN. $tagName. self::TAG_CLOSE;
00066     } //----- End of BuildTag
00067     
00075     public function SetSkeleton ( $skeleton )
00076     {
00077         $this->skeleton = $skeleton;
00078     } //----- End of SetSkeleton

00100     public function SetTag ( $tagName , Template & $value )
00101     {
00102         $this->tags[ $this->BuildTag ( $tagName ) ] = $value;
00103     } //----- End of SetTag
00104     
00116     public function GetTag ( $tagName )
00117     {
00118         if ( $this->TagExists( $tagName ) )
00119         {
00120             return $this->tags[  $this->BuildTag ( $tagName ) ];
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124             $errs = new Errors ( );
00125             
00126             $errs->Add( new TemplateError( TemplateError::TEMPLATE_TAG_INEXISTANT , 'The tag named '. $tag  . ' doesn\'t exist.' ) );
00127             
00128             return $errs;
00129         }
00130     } //----- End of GetTag
00131     
00145     public function AddToTag ( $tagName, $value )
00146     {
00147         if ( $this->TagExists( $tagName ) )
00148         {
00149                         $this->GetTag ( $tagName )->skeleton .= $value;
00150 
00151                         return null;
00152         }
00153         else
00154         {
00155             $errs = new Errors ( );
00156             
00157             $errs->Add( new TemplateError( TemplateError::TEMPLATE_TAG_INEXISTANT , 'The tag named '. $tag . ' doesn\'t exist.' ) );
00158             
00159             return $errs;
00160         }
00161     } //----- End of AddToTag
00162     
00172     public function TagExists ( $tagName )
00173     {
00174         return isset ( $this->tags[ Template::BuildTag( $tagName ) ] );
00175     } //----- End of TagExists
00176     
00189     public function Generate( $cached = false )
00190     {
00191                 if ( $cached && ! empty ( $this->lastGenerated ) )
00192                 {
00193                         return $this->lastGenerated;
00194                 }
00195         
00196                 $generated = $this->skeleton;
00197                 $lastGenerated = '';
00198 
00199                 while ( $generated != $lastGenerated )
00200                 {
00201                         $lastGenerated = $generated;
00202                         
00203                         foreach ( $this->tags as $tag => $value )
00204                         // replace tags by value, generated by subtemplates...
00205                         {
00206                                 // generation by hierarchy
00207                                 $val = $value->Generate( true );
00208                                 $generated = str_replace ( $tag, $val, $generated );
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211 
00212                 $this->lastGenerated = $generated;
00213                 
00214         return $generated;
00215     } //----- End of Generate
00216     
00217 //-------------------------------------------- Constructors - destructors
00222     public function __construct( )
00223     {
00224                 parent::__construct();
00225         
00226         $this->tags = array();
00227     } //---- End of __construct
00228          
00232     function __destruct( )
00233         {       
00234                 parent::__destruct();
00235         } //----- End of Destructor
00236   
00237 //---------------------------------------------------------- Magic Methods
00246         public function __ToString ()
00247         {
00248                 return $this->Generate ( );
00249         } // End of __ToString
